text: Imagine a sheet of paper on which straight Lines Triangles Squares Pentagons; Hexagons and other figures, instead of remaining fixed in their places, move freely about on the surface, but without the power of rising above or sinking below it; very much like shadows only hard and with luminous edges, and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen. Alas, a few years ago, I should have said universe but now my mind has been opened to higher views of things.
